text:
This is one of the rare pools in Singapore to have a 4m depth section. Great for diving and breath hold / apnea training.

Also very clean as not many people use it and those who use are more conscious of cleanliness.

Nice 50m pool with affordable pricing. Pool is clean and water is refreshing. It's much deeper (I think it's for diving) at one end so if you're worried, just swim near the lane ropes. There are lifeguards on duty too.

It's just a little far in, so you'll have to walk some distance from the bus stop.

Friendly counter (check-in?) staff too.

I'll visit again for a swim :-)

- S$1.7 for adult on weekends and holidays.
- Changing room is clean.
- There are 2 types of pool: competition and training. Competition pool has 3 levels of depth: 1m4, 1m5 and 3m.
- Not much people, only 1 access gate, it is far from the main gate of sport hub, around 500m there is no bus and mrt.

The pool is nested close to the botanic garden on the ground of the old national university of Singapore. The pool is use by very few swimmers as it situated in an area with not public housing. (09/01/2023) Every Monday, the pool will be closed for maintenance.

Opening hours, Tuesday to Sunday 1800 till 2130
Nice 4-meter deep public swimming pool, but too far from public transport. I had to walk for 15 mins from Stevens. No buses around.
